item.title: Transformer
item.author: liu-huo@live.com (æ‘¸é“æ ¡å°‰ğŸ¥‰)
item.description: Tokenizer Embedding ä¸‰è§’ä½ç½®ç¼–ç class PositionEmbedding(nn.Module): def __init__(self, dim, base=10000, max_seq_len=512): super().__init__() self.dim = dim pe = torch.zeros(max_seq_len, dim) for pos in range(max_seq_len): for i in range(0, dim, 2): pe[pos][i] = math.sin(pos / (base ** (2 * i / self.dim))) pe[pos][i + 1] = math.cos(pos / (base ** (2 * (i + 1) / self.dim))) pe = pe.unsqueeze(dim=0) self.register_buffer('pe', pe) def forward(self, x): x = x
